Name: Close Encounter VR
About the game: In this short, 10 minute long, purely cinematic VR experience a peaceful evening turns into a horror movie, leading to face-to-face encounters with extraterrestrials. It's not all 'doom and gloom' however, as you find out upon your eventual return to Earth.
